title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Designing Self-Directed Science Learning Through Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans at least once weekly using remote platforms
Learners can complete 80% or more of science theory-based project assignments while incorporating peer feedback
Learners can perform peer-to-peer knowledge-sharing activities three or more times using LMS collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
